Premium Cigars and Luxury Accessories Watch About Us Welcome to Cigar Inc. â€” Where Luxury Meets Legacy At Cigar Inc., we are proud to be a premier distributor of premium cigars and high-end cigar accessories , serving discerning enthusiasts across the globe. Headquartered in Los Angeles, we offer both a luxurious retail experience and a seamless online store tailored to the needs of aficionados who demand the best. We curate only the finest cigars from prestigious brands, featuring rare blends, limited editions, and collector-grade releases. Our exclusive accessories include handcrafted humidors , precision cutters, and luxury lightersâ€”each designed to elevate your smoking experience. Cigar Inc. is also a U.S. distributor of select collections in collaboration with iconic names like El Septimo, Brizard & Co., and Lucky Cigar . With deep industry relationships and trusted partnerships, we bring exceptional craftsmanship and exclusivity directly to your humidor. Whether you're purchasing for your private collection, preparing for a special event, or gifting a true connoisseur, Cigar Inc. delivers a standard of quality worthy of the moment. Visit our Los Angeles showroom or shop online at www.cigarinc.com . Experience the world of premium cigarsâ€”crafted for those who expect nothing less than luxury. Series for Leaders Destination Master Plan NMB Chamber Foundation Foundation Board Community Grants State of Series Signature Events Annual Awards Soiree Chair's Lunch Marketing Outlook Summit Partner Benefits Business Directory Affinity Programs Office Depot BlueCross BlueShield Sports Pass Community North Myrtle Beach History Publications Visitors Guide NMB Map NMB Community Resources Guide Community Events Visitor Calendar NMB Christmas Parade Application Join Now Partner Application About Back Get Involved Back Partner Benefits Back Community Back Join Now Back Business Directory Visitor Info Contact Us Partner Portal Leadership & Team At Destination North Myrtle Beach, strong leadership is at the core of our success. Our organization is guided by a dedicated Board of Directors, made up of local business leaders who are deeply invested in the growth and vitality of our community. Our Board members are elected by our investor/partners through an annual nominations and elections process held each fall. Each Director serves a three-year term beginning in January, with the opportunity to serve up to two consecutive terms. Board members bring valuable perspectives from across industries, helping shape policies and initiatives that support economic growth, community well-being, and sustainable development.Â For those interested in becoming a member of the Board of Directors, the Duties and Responsibilities and the Conflict of Interest Policy are available for review.Â Interested in serving on the board? We welcome committed business leaders who share our vision for a stronger, more connected North Myrtle Beach. The Executive Committee is comprised of the officers and committee chairs. 2025 Board of Directors Executive Committee Ben Clyburn Board Chair Condo-World Whitney Prince Vice Chair & Sustainability Committee Chair Boardwalk Billy's Denise Ambuhl Treasurer HTC Gretchen Floyd Immediate Past Chair The Citizens Bank Cheryl Y. Kilday, CDME Secretary, President & CEO Destination North Myrtle Beach Eric Rivenbark Economic Development Committee Chair Coastal Carolina University Morgan Jackson Destination Marketing Committee Chair Duplin Winery Andy Thomas Public Policy & Advocacy Committee Chair Thomas Beach Vacations Corey Richardson Business Development Committee Chair RE/MAX Southern Shores Ex-Officio Board Members Mark Lane NMB Chamber Foundation Board, Board Chair Sand Dollar Media Brandon Cox Destination Master Plan & Momentum Chair Elliott Beach Rentals Board Members Adam Gullidge Alabama Theatre AJ Gohil East Coast Golf Management Beverly Race Greg Norman Australian Grille Cary McLeod Seaside Vacations Jim Eggen Avista Resort Holly Formanek Hampton Inn Harbourgate Jim Hanley Thoroughbreds Chophouse Kelly G. Hughes McLeod Health Kim Kelley Barefoot Landing Matt Gibbons City of North Myrtle Beach - Parks & Recreation Monroe Baldwin Myrtle Beach Tours Tina Hunter The Humane Society of North Myrtle Beach Weston Parker Myrtle Beach Vacation Rentals.com Destination NMB Program Team Cheryl Y. Kilday, CDME President & CEO Email: ckilday@destinationnmb.com Phone: (843) 361-3039 Cheryl Y. Kilday, CDME is a seasoned expert in destination marketing and management, and has dedicated much of her career to membership-based organizations focused on economic and community development.  

In addition to her role with Destination North Myrtle Beach, Cheryl oversees the NMB Chamber Foundation, which awards community grants to local nonprofits supporting people in need. 

Cheryl serves on the Waccamaw Advisory Board through the South Carolina Department of Employment and Workforce, and sits on the board of the Myrtle Beach Regional Economic Development Corporation. Cheryl actively participates in leadership roles, community engagement, and advocacy through input sessions, boards, and committees and is a graduate of the McLeod Health Foundation Fellows program.  

Her commitment to the community extends to volunteer work, such as serving on the North Myrtle Beach Sea Turtle Patrol. Cheryl has also led initiatives like the North Myrtle Beach Reusable Campaign and the COVID Recovery Task Force, contributing to regional recovery efforts and sustainability.  

Before joining Destination North Myrtle Beach, Cheryl held similar leadership positions with organizations in Oregon, Virginia, and Washington State. She is a Certified Destination Management Executive (CDME) and has led three organizations to earn Destination Management Accreditation, with North Myrtle Beach receiving the designation "with distinction." The organization has also maintained its 5-Star accreditation from the U.S. Chamber of Commerce.  

Highlights of Cherylâ€™s career include helping pass legislation to establish a public-private partnership for state tourism marketing in Washington State and serving on the board that created The Journey Through Hallowed Ground National Heritage Area. Cheryl also earned an Emmy Award for a series of history videosâ€”a groundbreaking approach to travel promotion at the time. Currently, she is passionate about advancing the Destination Master Plan in North Myrtle Beach.  

Cheryl is a former board member of Destinations International and a trustee for the Destinations International Travel Foundation, where she continues to serve on committees. She has also contributed her expertise to numerous state and local boards and committees dedicated to community and tourism development. Leslie A. Wallace Advocacy & Business Development Director Email: lwallace@destinationnmb.com Phone: 843-361-3042 Leslie Wallace joined Destination North Myrtle Beach as the Advocacy and Business Development Director, bringing with her more than 20 years of dedicated public service and community engagement. With extensive experience in political campaigns at the local, state, and federal levels, as well as in public interest initiatives, Leslie has built a career on fostering collaboration and driving results.

In her previous role with county government, she worked closely with local businesses to advance economic development, strengthen community partnerships, and advocate for policies that support growth and prosperity.

Passionate about connecting people, ideas, and opportunities, Leslie is committed to championing the interests of North Myrtle Beachâ€™s business community while enhancing its reputation as a premier coastal destination. Outside of work, she enjoys spending time at the beach, perfecting her golf game, and diving into a good book. Her blend of professional expertise and personal appreciation for the coastal lifestyle make her a valuable advocate for the regionâ€™s continued success. Erin Graham Marketing Director Email: egraham@destinationnmb.com Phone: (843) 361-3046 Wimberly Hubert Office Administrator Email: whubert@DestinationNMB.com Phone: (843) 361-3045 Elena King Burns Business Development Manager Email: eking@destinationnmb.com Phone: (843) 361-3047 Pierce Edge Digital Communications & CRM Manager Email: pedge@destinationnmb.com Phone: 843-361-3044 Charlene Lynam Visitor Services Coordinator Email: clynam@destinationnmb.com Phone: (843) 281-2662 Subscribe to our Newsletter Stay up-to-date on the latest events, best things to do, and tastiest bites to eat, simply by signing up for our E-Newsletter.
